title: Person of Interest - 5x13 'return 0' - Good Bye
author: POISuit
comment: I love how the show ended with an episode that was mostly Reese and Finch. Despite the addition of so many other characters, the core will always be Reese and Finch. Truly a beautiful ending to a wonderful show.
John's life with the Machine ended how it began: With a suitcase and a missile.

Remember when a kid described John to be a Rounin?

That description was so appropriate since John got to die like a true Samurai, he died a beautiful death, saving his best friend so that Harold could finally live the normal life he never had

I'm glad that a good number of people were affected by this. I feel like an outsider when the finale that everyone on the planet is gushing about comes from a show I stopped watching and the final heartbreaking moments of something that I did watch comes from a show that you'll barely hear a whisper about.
